body: Conspiracy theorists might wonder: Are the new board members on the same page? Is this the plan for some sort of alternate plan to give everyone an 'out' from the deal?
Are ppl that profited from the gain in SP done cashing in on the prospect of a deal
Note that I'm not saying that any of this is the case.
I'm generally bullish on Petroteq
